title: Mr Money
creator_credit: M T I Teleprograms, Film Communications, Karen Lund and Shevard Goldstein
brief_description: An amusing look at automation in banking. “Mr Money” is a talking automatic telling machine with quite a personality - giving each customer what he considers they deserve.
creator_credit_for_label: M T I Teleprograms, Film Communications, Karen Lund and Shevard Goldstein
